rukus.text: 76|23|vaastav mein, hamane hee utaara hai aapapar quraan thoda-thoda karake.
76|24|atah, aap dhairy se kaam len apane paalanahaar ke aadeshaanusaar aur baat na maanen, unamen se kisee paapee tatha krtaghn kee.
76|25|tatha smaran karen apane paalanahaar ke naam ka, praatah tatha sandhya (ke samay).
76|26|tatha raatri mein sajda karen usake samaksh aur usakee pavitrata ka varnan karen, raatri ke lambe samay tak.
76|27|vaastav mein, ye log moh rakhate hain sansaar se aur chhod rahe hain apane peechhe ek bhaaree din[1] ko.
76|28|hamane hee unhen paida kiya hai aur sudrdh kiye hain unake jod-band tatha jab ham chaahen badala den unake[1] jaise (doosaron ko).
76|29|nishchay ye (soorah) ek shiksha hai. atah, jo chaahe apane paalanahaar kee or (jaane kee) raah bana le.
76|30|aur tum allaah kee ichchha ke bina kuchh bhee nahin chaah sakate.[1] vaastav mein, allaah sab cheezon aur gunon ko jaanane vaala hai.
76|31|vah pravesh deta hai jise chaahe apanee daya mein aur atyaachaariyon ke lie usane taiyaar kee hai duhkhadaayee yaatana.
